title.narrative: North Eastern Region Capital Cities Development Investment Program - Tranche 3

description.narrative: Tranche 3 will include physical investments in water supply, solid waste and sanitation improvement in Agartala and Aizawl, and non-physical investments to continue supporting implementation of urban reforms agreed under the North Eastern Region Capital Cities Development Investment Program (NERCCDIP) in these cities. Two tranches have been approved to date under NERCCDIP (Projects 1 and 2). All three projects have been sequenced based on the implementation capacity and sector priorities of the Investment Program cities, and will collectively meet the intended outcomes of NERCCDIP.

title.narrative: Reports and Recommendations of the President

description.narrative: Increased access to sustainable and improved urban services in Agartala and Aizawl.

title.narrative: Reports and Recommendations of the President
b1. Aizawl: Additional 5,290 HH manage their septage safely

description.narrative: Increased access to sustainable and improved urban services in Agartala and Aizawl.

title.narrative: b2. Agartala: Additional 75,800 HH manage their septage safely

description.narrative: Increased access to sustainable and improved urban services in Agartala and Aizawl.

title.narrative:
By 2020,
a1. Aizawl: Additional 30,000 HHs receive treated water for a minimum of 12 hours per day (including FHH)

description.narrative: Increased access to sustainable and improved urban services in Agartala and Aizawl.

title.narrative: d1. Aizawl: O&M cost recovery of water and sanitation services reaches 60%

description.narrative: Increased access to sustainable and improved urban services in Agartala and Aizawl.

title.narrative: a2. Agartala: Additional 40,000 HHs receive treated water for a minimum of 12 hours per day (including FHH)

description.narrative: Increased access to sustainable and improved urban services in Agartala and Aizawl.

title.narrative: d2. Agartala: O&M cost recovery of water and sanitation services reaches 100%

description.narrative: Increased access to sustainable and improved urban services in Agartala and Aizawl.

title.narrative: c2. Agartala: 105,130 HHs receive improved SWM services of 100% collection and treatment

description.narrative: Increased access to sustainable and improved urban services in Agartala and Aizawl.

title.narrative: c1. Aizawl: 71,700 HHs receive improved SWM services of 100% collection and treatment

description.narrative: Increased access to sustainable and improved urban services in Agartala and Aizawl.
